DATE_AND_TIME.doc: DATE_AND_TIME(DATE,TIME,ZONE,VALUES) returns date/time from real-time clock. [F90]

MVBITS.doc: MVBITS(FROM,FROMPOS,LEN,TO,TOPOS) copies LEN bits from FROM to TO. [F90]

RANDOM_NUMBER.doc: RANDOM_NUMBER(HARVEST) returns pseudorandom numbers from uniform distribution [0,1). [F90]

RANDOM_SEED.doc: RANDOM_SEED(SIZE,PUT,GET) initializes or queries the random number generator. [F90]
